description: Bogie is dressed up like a hippie and runs a little shop selling various items. Haruka got a Wish Maker (ウィッシュメーカー) from him, an item that grants one to the owner. Bogie explained to Haruka that in order for it to work, she must close the sides on the Wish Maker while the comet is in the sky in order for her wish to come true.
name: Bogie
